Package com.randomnoun.maven.plugin.swaggerCombine

Class SwaggerCombineMojo

java.lang.Object
org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
com.randomnoun.maven.plugin.swaggerCombine.SwaggerCombineMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
@Mojo(name="swagger-combine", defaultPhase=GENERATE_SOURCES) public class SwaggerCombineMojo extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
Maven goal which combines a bunch of yaml files into a big yaml file.
